Table of Contents

Namespace Alis.Core.Physic.Collision.Distance

Classes

DistanceGjk

The Gilbert distance algorithm that provides the distance between shapes. Using Voronoi regions and Barycentric coordinates.

Structs

DistanceInput

Input for Distance.ComputeDistance(). You have to option to use the shape radii in the computation.

DistanceOutput

Output for Distance.ComputeDistance().

DistanceProxy

A distance proxy is used by the GJK algorithm. It encapsulates any shape.

ShapeCastInput

Input parameters for b2ShapeCast

ShapeCastOutput

Output results for b2ShapeCast
